description: This file contains unit tests for the UtilsFile utility class, testing file creation, moving, and verification functionalities using Google Test framework.

classes.name: Core::Directory
classes.description: Represents filesystem directory operations, such as creation and destruction.

classes.name: Core::File
classes.description: Represents file operations, including creation, existence check, reading, writing, and loading file info.

methods.name: Core::Directory::Destroy
methods.description: Deletes the directory at the specified path.

methods.name: Core::File::Exists
methods.description: Checks if the file exists at the specified path.

methods.name: Core::File::Create
methods.description: Creates a new file at the specified path.

methods.name: Utils::MoveFile
methods.description: Moves a file from source to destination.

methods.name: Core::File::LoadFileInfo
methods.description: Loads file information such as size and timestamps.

methods.name: Core::File::Open
methods.description: Opens the file for reading or writing.

methods.name: Core::File::Read
methods.description: Reads data from the file into a buffer.
